description: Skillsets and subskills taxonomy for e-learning content tagging. Activities are tagged with subskills, lessons/courses with skillsets.

skillsets.name: Communication
skillsets.description: Skills for effective verbal and written communication

subskills.name: Active Listening
subskills.description: Fully concentrating on what is being said rather than just passively hearing

subskills.name: Clear Writing
subskills.description: Writing that is concise, organized, and easy to understand

subskills.name: Difficult Conversations
subskills.description: Navigating challenging or sensitive discussions effectively

subskills.name: Feedback
subskills.description: Giving and receiving constructive feedback

subskills.name: Storytelling
subskills.description: Using narrative to engage and persuade

subskills.name: Stakeholder Communication
subskills.description: Tailoring messages for different audiences and stakeholders

subskills.name: Meeting Facilitation
subskills.description: Running effective, productive meetings

subskills.name: Empathy
subskills.description: Understanding and sharing the feelings of others

subskills.name: Negotiation
subskills.description: Reaching mutually beneficial agreements

subskills.name: Presentation
subskills.description: Delivering compelling presentations to groups

skillsets.name: Leadership
skillsets.description: Skills for guiding and inspiring teams

subskills.name: Coaching
subskills.description: Developing others through guidance and support

subskills.name: Delegation

subskills.name: Motivation

subskills.name: Decision Making
subskills.description: Making timely, informed decisions

subskills.name: Vision Setting
subskills.description: Creating and communicating a compelling future state

subskills.name: 1:1 Management
subskills.description: Conducting effective individual meetings with direct reports

subskills.name: Conflict Resolution
subskills.description: Resolving disagreements constructively

subskills.name: Accountability
subskills.description: Taking ownership and holding others responsible

subskills.name: Hiring
subskills.description: Recruiting and selecting the right talent

subskills.name: Performance Reviews
subskills.description: Evaluating and discussing performance effectively

skillsets.name: Collaboration
skillsets.description: Skills for working effectively with others

subskills.name: Alignment

subskills.name: Remote Collaboration
subskills.description: Working effectively with distributed teams

subskills.name: Decision Logs
subskills.description: Documenting decisions for transparency and reference

subskills.name: Hand-offs

subskills.name: Facilitation
subskills.description: Guiding group processes and discussions

subskills.name: Trust Building
subskills.description: Developing mutual confidence and reliability

skillsets.name: Productivity

subskills.name: Prioritization

subskills.description: Using time effectively and efficiently

subskills.name: Focus

subskills.name: Planning
subskills.description: Creating actionable plans for achieving goals

subskills.name: Execution
subskills.description: Following through on plans and commitments

subskills.name: Deep Work
subskills.description: Performing cognitively demanding tasks without distraction

subskills.name: Habit Building
subskills.description: Creating sustainable routines and practices

subskills.name: Goal Setting
subskills.description: Defining clear, achievable objectives

subskills.name: Personal Organization
subskills.description: Keeping track of tasks, notes, and information

subskills.name: Stress Management
subskills.description: Handling pressure and maintaining wellbeing

taggingRules.activity: Must be tagged with exactly 1 subskill (parent skillset is implied)
taggingRules.lesson: Must be tagged with exactly 1 skillset
taggingRules.course: Must be tagged with exactly 1 skillset
